column1: #Text=Actor Ozai says : " With the energy harnessed from that comet , no one will be able to stop ... the Fire Nation ! "
#Text=Actress Azula says : " Father , Zuko and the Avatar are at the Palace .
#Text=You find the Fire Lord , I 'll hold her off !
#Text=" Actress Azula says : " You are no longer my brother .
#Text=I am the rightful heir to the throne !
#Text=" Actor Ozai says : " So , you have mastered all four elements ?
#Text=" Actress Aang says : " Yeah , and now you 're going down !
#Text=It is you who are going down !
#Text=The comet is already here , and I 'm unstoppable !
#Text=" Actress Azula says : " It is over , Father .
#Text=The dreams of my father , and my father 's father , have now been realized !
#Text=" Zuko says : " That ... was n't a good play .
#Text=" Sokka says : " But the effects were decent .
